overview: Rickshaw puller Aslam lost his primary source of livelihood, his rickshaw in an accident. He wandered aimlessly and picked up a pistol in the slum. With this pistol he went out to avenge all the wrongs done to him. But in a city full of rubbish, Aslam squirmed like a cockroach trapped in a spider's web.
title: Ekjon Telapoka
